# [Interview #128: WH Signing Report - Br00se, Entry #6](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=128#6)

#### Robert Jordan

When asked about the total number of books, he gave the stock answer of at least three more books. When I suggested that 13 was a nice symmetrical number, he looked up at the ceiling and made a comment that he hope it didn't take that long. I hope I can find that on the tape.
